attributes.action: longer sentences for child sex offenders, sex offenders and paedophiles
attributes.additional_details:
I want the Government to extend the jail sentences and make the consequences for sexual assault more effective. 
Too many women and men are scared to walk outside on their own due to fear of being assaulted. Its time things changed
attributes.background: I and a lot of people i have spoken to want to extend the jail sentences for sex offenders of any kind. We want to end the fear and panic of all women and men who are effected by this issue.
